trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ProfileEventArgs class during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la classe ProfileEventArgs durante il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento per specificare un profilo utente personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the ProfileEventArgs parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se, quando il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento termina, il parametro ProfileEventArgs del <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>è relativo <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>proprietà è impostata su un valore che non è `null`, quindi l' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>utilizza il valore della <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>proprietà nell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs"></xref> class.

The ProfileEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Il ProfileEventArgs crea un'istanza della <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>classe e imposta la <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A>proprietà specificata <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>oggetto fornisce informazioni sugli eventi all' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento di <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di contesto fornisce l'accesso per il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>della richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> per la richiesta corrente

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user profile for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il profilo utente per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Profile property during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà di profilo durante il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento per specificare un profilo utente personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its Profile property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the Profile property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se, quando il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento termina, il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>parametro del <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>profilo proprietà è impostata su un valore che non è `null`, quindi l' <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>utilizza il valore della proprietà del profilo corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> does not set the Profile property for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>non è impostata la proprietà di profilo per il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> only gets the value of the Profile property when the code in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>ottiene solo il valore della proprietà del profilo quando il codice di <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>completamento dell'evento.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: If the Profile property is not explicitly set by application code during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event, the Profile property value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà di profilo non è impostata in modo esplicito dal codice dell'applicazione durante la <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento, il valore di proprietà di profilo sarà `null`.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: The user profile to use for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Il profilo utente da utilizzare per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
